Current

I am working as an Interaction Designer at DEFRA within the Environmental Agency until 1st November 2023.

I am leading the design approach for a high-profile, high-in-demand incident reporting tool for internal and external users.

My day to day tasks are usually:

  • Journey mapping
  • User flows
  • Prototyping
  • GDS Design System Standards
  • GDS assessment preparation and presentation
  • Design Ops support
  • Accessibility guidance and support
  • Stakeholder influencing
  • Workshop facilitation

Using my experience to help improve and support the digital culture and client experiences, developing and mentoring other designers, supporting and instigating a design system and creating a safe community to learn, share and ask questions.
